p: Moreover, Tualang honey appeared to have a protective role against bisphenol-A (BPA)-induced toxicity in rat uterus by improving the morphological abnormalities, reducing lipid peroxidation and normalising ERα, ERβ and C3 expression distribution in the rat uterus [ 140]. The same protective effect was also exhibited in BPA-induced ovarian toxicity, where Tualang honey reduced the morphological abnormalities of the ovarian follicles and improved the normal estrous cycle [ 141].
